name: Items which should not routinely be prescribed in primary care - perindopril arginine
title: Perindopril arginine cost per 1000 patients
description: Cost of perindopril arginine per 1000 patients
why_it_matters: Perindopril is an ACE inhibitor used in heart failure, hypertension, diabetic nephropathy, and prophylaxis of cardiovascular events.
The perindopril arginine salt version is more stable in extremes of climate than the perindopril erbumine salt, which gives it a longer shelf-life.
However, perindopril arginine is significantly more expensive than perindopril erbumine and a
PrescQIPP CIC review of the topic found no clinical advantage for the arginine salt.
NICE guidance on hypertension in adults recommends that prescribing costs are minimised.
Due to the significant extra costs of the arginine salt and the availability of the erbumine salt, the joint clinical working group
considered perindopril arginine suitable for inclusion in this guidance.
• Deprescribe in patients currently prescribed this medicine.
• Prescribe only if no other item or intervention is clinically appropriate.
• Prescribe only if no other item or intervention is available.
numerator_bnf_codes_query: SELECT DISTINCT v.bnf_code FROM dmd.vmp v
INNER JOIN dmd.vpi i ON i.vmp = v.id
INNER JOIN dmd.ing g ON g.id = i.ing
WHERE g.id=442509000 --ING code for perindopril arginine
SELECT DISTINCT a.bnf_code FROM dmd.amp a
INNER JOIN dmd.vmp v ON a.vmp = v.id
INNER JOIN dmd.vpi i ON i.vmp = v.id
INNER JOIN dmd.ing g ON g.id = i.ing
WHERE g.id=442509000 --ING code for perindopril arginine
AND (a.bnf_code IS NOT NULL AND a.bnf_code !='NA')
